meanings.def: a country that has a king or queen as head of state (= official leader of the country)
examples: He ruled the ancient kingdom of Kaffa.
It was one of the richest towns in the kingdom.
changes that were taking place throughout the kingdom

meanings.def: an area controlled by a particular person or where a particular thing or idea is important
one of the three traditional divisions of the natural world
examples: the animal, vegetable and mineral kingdoms

meanings.def: one of the five major groups into which all living things are organized
to completely destroy somebody/something with an explosion
examples: The truck was blown to kingdom come.
He’ll talk till kingdom come if you let him.

idioms.def: to completely destroy somebody/something with an explosion
examples: The truck was blown to kingdom come.
He’ll talk till kingdom come if you let him.
